{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Micro Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mangopi.org/mangopi_mq |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MangoPi |model = MPi-MQ1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;D1s;F133-A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = RISC-V<!-- XuanTie C906 --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Allwinner;D1s;onchicp; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.05;; |stockos = Linux;5.4.61;TinaLinux;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type C), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, MIPI DSI, DVP Camera Interface |addchip = 1.2MHz White LED Driver;AeroSemi;MT9284;;1;,,, Filterless Class-D Mono Audio Amplifier;Diodes Inc;PAM8301;;1;,,, 100mA Low Dropout CMOS Voltage Regulator;Torex;XC6206;;3;,,, 1.5MHz 5.5V 2A 3 Channel DC Step-down PMU;RyChip;RY1303;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2022 |estprice = 39 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8189FTV; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MangoPi x AWOL", "Nehza-MQ" and "V1.6-211219" :are silkscreened on the board top. "MANGOPI", "RISC-V", "RT-Thread inside" and "mangopi.org" :are silkscreened on the board bottom.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1s @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 RISC-V *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 64MB (DDR2) SDRAM integrated *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8189FTV :802.11bgn (1T1R) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) *GPIO: 1x 22-pin connector *Power Source: 5V via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/MangoPi_MQ1 ''MangoPi MQ1'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/mangopi-mq1-is-an-ultra-compact-soon-to-be-open-source-allwinner-d1-risc-v-dev-board-eb5388783a0e ''MangoPi-MQ1 Is an Ultra-Compact D1 RISC-V Dev Board'' on '''Hackster.io''']
==See also== *[[MangoPi MQ1W]] • [https://github.com/mangopi-sbc/MQ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MQ Pro (1GB)]] *[[MangoPi MQ Quad]] • [https://habr.com/ru/post/686520/ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MCore H616]]
